text: Vuga (yewe Muhamadi) uti “Ni nde waziririje imyambaro myiza n’amafunguro meza Allah yashyiriyeho abagaragu be?” Vuga uti “Ibyo, mu buzima bwa hano ku isi, bigenewe abemeye (bakaba babihuriyeho n’abatemera), ariko bikaba umwihariko (ku bemera) ku munsi w’imperuka.” Uko ni ko dusobanura amagambo (yacu) ku bantu bafite ubumenyi
